meanings.definition: A tropical shrub or small tree with glossy leaves and clusters of small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cocoplum in the garden has shiny leaves.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful cocoplum tree in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cocoplum whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as glossy as a cocoplum leaf.
meanings.sent5: The cocoplum tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.

meanings.definition: The edible fruit of the cocoplum plant.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the sweet taste of cocoplum.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh cocoplum fruits.
meanings.sent3: The cocoplum fruit danced in the fruit salad.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was as infectious as the flavor of cocoplum.
meanings.sent5: The cocoplum fruit burst with juicy goodness.

meanings.definition: A reddish-purple color resembling that of the fruit of the cocoplum plant.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely cocoplum shade.
meanings.sent2: The sunset sky turned a cocoplum hue.
meanings.sent3: His cheeks flushed cocoplum with embarrassment.
meanings.sent4: The cocoplum color of her dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The cocoplum sky at dusk was a sight to behold.
